articles.title: Asda shoppers asking staff to 'put shopping back' once costs reach £30 - Daily Record
articles.description: The boss of the UK supermarket chain has said he has spotted a change in shoppers' behaviour.
articles.content:
Asda shoppers have been setting themselves a strict spending limit for when they are picking up their weekly groceries at the supermarket.
